data.name: Ghost or Trick Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the demo version of the novel adventure game "Ghost or Trick".
You can play only the first day of the story in this demo game.
Also, the demo version does not allow you to see the list page.

This game is a novel adventure game about the mystery of a ghost that appears in a villa.
This story takes place in a world slightly different from our own.
In a certain city in a certain country, there was a detective agency.
All the detectives belonging to it were strange.
This was because they only investigated cases related to ghosts and monsters.
Then a request comes in for them.
The player becomes the assistant of detective Arthur and works with him to get to the bottom of the case.

STORY
The ghost appears at the villa of a nobleman.
Jake or Jessica, who has been assigned to work as a detective's assistant for only seven days, begins investigating the ghosts with Arthur, a detective of beauty.
Is it a "real ghost" or the work of a "human"?
The player's choice will guide Arthur.

GAME


CHARACTERS

data.short_description: This game is a novel adventure game where the player becomes the assistant of Arthur, a detective, and solves mysteries. This time, you have to investigate the ghost that has appeared at the villa. Arthur is waiting for your help. Let's head to the villa as soon as possible.

  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
